Name: Fungiman
About the game: Fungiman is an atmospheric and challenging first person survival horror game. You find yourself in the forest, as in fifty thousand billion other games. You admire nature, beautiful flowers, trees and mineshafts and do not even suspect that 'He', the warden of the fungar forest, the Füngiman, has been watching you all this time. Why is he following you? He makes sure that no one touches his donuts - the main source of his füngus power. But you also need these donuts, simply because you are a human, and these donuts are really delicious. And you want to collect and eat them all. It would seem that the Füngus will be angry if you eat his donuts... or not? Features: • Füngiman changes his behavior and tactics throughout the game • Two levels: classic and reworked • Diverse locations • Secret minigames
